titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Belgium
Belgium

div.head: Legislation
div.p: A Ministerial Decree of 12 December 2003 set public access to documents after they are 30 years old. Requests to see files between 30 and 50 years old must be approved by a Diplomatic Committee.

div.head: Location
div.p: Federal Public Service Foreign Affairs, Foreign Trade and Development Cooperation, Archives Directorate, Diplomatic and African archives Rue de Petits Carmes, 15, B-1000 Brussels

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers are advised to contact the Archives ahead of time as many requests require third party approval.

div.head: Published Documents
div.p: The Royal Academy of Belgium has periodically published volumes of documents relating to Belgian Foreign Policy.
